name: Lens Life II
description:
The Visual Novel “Lens Life2” will present an exquisite short story for players:

Some one day you and oneself admire in the heart of classmate accident meet when working, discover to live together with a building, in the process that get along with day and night, you discovered a few strange secret that happen on her body.

Through dialogue and observation, work to buy gifts, make the right choice to increase goodwill, how to explore and face her secret decided the direction of the event

What choices will you make?
